description:
The Deluxe model lets big, tall hikers enjoy hammock camping. It floats you above wet, rocky or sloped ground and doubles as a chair. Either side of the rainfly can be tilted to any angle or rolled away. The whole thing sets up so quickly that taking mid-day siestas and hiking only in the cool of morning and evening becomes a viable option.

  • For users up to 136kg and 213cm tall
  • Zippered side entrance means you don’t have to crouch for access
  • Ridgeline holds the integral no-see-netting off your face
  • 3-meter long suspension ropes are low-stretch polyester and tested to 1225kg
  • Tree-hugger nylon webbing at the ends of the suspension ropes protects tree bark
  • Stuff sack is printed with set-up instructions
name: Hennessy Explorer Deluxe Asymmetrical Zip Hammock

value: Snake Skins stuff sack sold separately
